entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Friday 14 April 2023
